main event: A round object and a cigar-shaped object were observed by radar in Long Beach, California on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The round object was described as bright, silvery, and the size of a basketball.,The cigar-shaped object looked like a star to the naked eye and was seen zigzagging in all directions.,Observations lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes.,Observers reported seeing three objects that discharged bright light at intervals.,Several possible explanations for the sightings were suggested, including balloon and aircraft.
sighted object: one round object and one cigar-shaped object
witness description: The observers stated that the objects were seen in the distance and showed motion slowly.
